resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/temp pl for load data from landing to sqlbd')]

query.value: @concat('select coalesce(cast(max(loaddate) as date),''','1900-01-01',''') as last_fetched_date from audit.load_logs where',' data_source=''',pipeline().parameters.datasource,''' and tablename=''',pipeline().parameters.tablename,'''')

@concat('select coalesce(cast(max(loaddate) as date),''','1900-01-01',''') as last_fetched_date from audit.load_logs where',' data_source=''',item().datasource,''' and tablename=''',item().tablename,'''')
